texts.content: I have a great passion and love for entrepreneurship and technology, which has allowed me to discover innate leadership and relationship skills. I enjoy generating strategies, executing them and working as a team with a clear vision towards a future full of technology

section_title.title: My Portfolio
section_title.subtitle: Visit my portfolio and keep your feedback

texts.content: kriptos is a growing solution dedicated to information classification using artificial intelligence.
kriptos has developed software that allows you to classify documents in windows, one drive, and guide detecting critical information and motivating you to protect against a cyber attack.

my contribution to this project focuses on two edges: 1. Help LATAM's most significant financial clients adopt the product and get the most value possible. 2. Manage the resolution of technical problems, actively participate in creating product roadmaps and manage all the processes of launching a new feature of the products or a new version.
A better synergy and communication between the marketing area, the support area, and the technology area has been one of my achievements in this project because I love working as a team

uShops was the first startup I created together with my co-founder and team. The solution proposed a platform that allowed small and large companies to sell and distribute their products on the Internet.

More than an e-commerce company, uShops intended to become a shopping network, where the experience involved being able to try a product through virtual reality before buying it. And on the other hand, to have a channel of fashion influencers that they can monetize while the economy of the entrepreneurs is growing.

Without a doubt, I found my passion in leadership. I loved leading my engineering, marketing, UX/ UI design, support, sales, and logistics teams. This experience allowed me to help create jobs and enjoy creating technology for a common problem in society.

ClickGas is a mobile application that helps you request a GAS cylinder when you need it from the comfort of your home—preventing the trucks that distribute this product from continuing to cause noise pollution due to the excessive noise they make in the streets when trying to sell said product.
ClickGas was one of the projects in which I got involved in the management of mobile application development, learning about new geolocation technologies.

My most important achievements in these projects lie in improving the management of agile teams by implementing methodologies such as OKRs and Scrum. Additionally, my job was to transmit the project's vision to stakeholders such as the municipality of Quito and the GAS associations in the city.

IMS is an inventory and billing system that allows businesses to control and manage the flow of their products. In this project, I had fun implementing agile team management methodologies. My job was to guide the UX and UI development and design team to meet the goals and objectives. I had the opportunity to build and structure my development, infrastructure, and UX/UI design team.

Global copiers is an application that allows you to record the technical information of industrial printers distributed in different companies so that the technical staff can access valuable information about the machine with just one click through its IP address.

I was responsible for everything related to the design of the interface and the image within the project, managing the test plans to test the new software and improve the usability of the platform together with the development team.
Kuapp is an application that was born as an idea in a Platzi challenge, in which six totally unknown people of different nationalities got together.

This application aims to solve the need for people to feel that they belong to a social group and the desire to discover new groups and activities where they can develop what personally when they are a tourist in a new place.
I was helping find techniques for effective MVP goal setting and product backlog management, as well as helping the team understand the need for clear and concise Product Backlog items.

Team of electronic and mechanical engineers with the challenge of providing technological solutions in the global health emergency caused by COVID-19, with the help of health experts, we are working to find a solution to the anticipated national lack of mechanical fans in Ecuador SMET C19 seeks to make available to the country a prototype of low-cost, compact and easy-to-build respirators, in the face of the current health emergency.

As the team leader, he performed functions such as: promoting teamwork, planning the different phases of the project, assigning the different roles in the team, directing and coordinating resources, managing the project's external relations, transmitting the results to stakeholders, management risks derived from the execution of tests and guarantee of compliance with FDA regulations.
